title: Deep Learning for Medical Image Analysis
description: Exploring convolutional neural networks for automated detection of diseases in medical imaging, with focus on accessible healthcare solutions for developing regions.

title: Autonomous Navigation in Unstructured Environments
authors: Mrs Omokhaba Blessing Yama, Lawal Giyath
description: Research on reinforcement learning algorithms enabling robots to navigate complex, unpredictable terrains without human intervention.

title: Natural Language Processing for Low-Resource Languages
description: Developing NLP models and datasets for Nigerian languages including Yoruba, Igbo, and Hausa to bridge the digital language divide.

title: Ethical AI: Bias Detection and Mitigation
description: Investigating methods to identify and reduce algorithmic bias in AI systems, ensuring fair and equitable outcomes across diverse populations.

title: Smart Grid Optimization Using Machine Learning
description: Applying machine learning techniques to optimize energy distribution in smart grids, reducing waste and improving reliability in power systems.

title: Human-Robot Interaction in Educational Settings
description: Studying how social robots can enhance learning experiences in classrooms, particularly for STEM education in primary and secondary schools.
